question_text: A company needs to grant a team of developers access to the company's AWS resources. The company must maintain a high level of security for the resources. The company requires an access control solution that will prevent unauthorized access to the sensitive data. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.A: Share the IAM user credentials for each development team member with the rest of the team to simplify access management and to streamline development workflows.
options.B: Define IAM roles that have fine-grained permissions based on the principle of least privilege. Assign an IAM role to each developer.
options.C: Create IAM access keys to grant programmatic access to AWS resources. Allow only developers to interact with AWS resources through API calls by using the access keys.
options.D: Create an AWS Cognito user pool. Grant developers access to AWS resources by using the user pool.
